root.PROPERTY:name: Name
root.FORM:ERROR:noRegions: Select at least one answer ROI.
root.form:help:dp: Inverse ratio of the accumulator resolution to the image resolution.
root.form:help:cannyThreshold: The higher threshold of the two passed to the Canny edge detector.
root.form:help:circleAccumulatorThreshold: The accumulator threshold for the circle centers at the detection stage. The smaller it is, the more false circles may be detected.
root.form:help:minimumRadius: Minimum radius of the recognized circles.
root.form:help:maximumRadius: Maximum radius of the recognized circles.
root.form:help:minimumDistance: Minimum distance between the centers of the detected circles. If the parameter is too small, multiple neighbor circles may be falsely detected in addition to a true one. If it is too large, some circles may be missed.
root.form:help:filledThreshold: RGP threshold below which pixels in the area of a given circle are to be considered painted (black).
root.form:help:markedThreshold: Minimal ratio of black pixels to all pixels in the given circle area to consider that circle as marked.
root.imageEditForm:title: Template image change
root.imageEditForm:msg:success: The template image was changed successfully!
root.imageEditForm:msg:failure: Failed to change the template image.
root.regionEditForm:title: Answer ROI edit
root.regionEditForm:question: Question
